Description: Complete tweezers made of copper alloy, broken into 3 joining fragments now glued. The metal sheet is corroded and has a thickness of 0. 25. The ends of the tweezer are slightly rounded and bend towards each other for the last 2cm of the ends.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D15.P, Mound β
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
